mapper.insert: INSERT INTO k_class_notice (class_notice_id, class_id, class_notice_no, class_notice_title, class_notice_con, class_notice_date, class_notice_hit, class_notice_file, class_notice_type) VALUES (102, 'A100', 1, #{classNoticeTitle}, #{classNoticeCon}, date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d'), 1, #{classNoticeFile}, #{classNoticeType} )
mapper.select: SELECT cn.class_id, cn.class_notice_no, cn.class_notice_type, cn.class_notice_title, cn.class_notice_date, c.class_id, c.prof_id, u.user_id, u.user_name FROM k_class_notice as cn JOIN k_class as c ON cn.class_id = c.class_id JOIN k_users as u ON c.prof_id = u.user_id WHERE cn.class_id = 'A100'
